properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As the deer panteth for the waters, So my soul longeth after Thee. You alone are my heart’s desire, And I long to worship Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You alone are my strength, my shield. To You alone may my spirit yield. You alone are my heart’s desire And I long to worship Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You’re my friend and You are my brother, Even though You are a King. I love You more than any other, So much more than anything.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You alone are my strength, my shield. To You alone may my spirit yield. You alone are my heart’s desire And I long to worship Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love You more than gold or silver, Only You can satisfy. You alone are the real joy giver And the apple of my eye.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You alone are my strength, my shield. To You alone may my spirit yield. You alone are my heart’s desire And I long to worship Thee.{/lang-eng}
